titleStmt.title: By the King, His Majesties proclamation to all the inhabitants of his counties of Oxford, North-Hampton, Buckingham, Middlesex, Surrey, Berks, South-Hampton, Wilts, Glocester, Worcester, Warwicke, Sussex, and Kent commanding them to give notice to the next quarter of His Majesties army, of the approach of any of the rebells forces neere to them.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our court at Oxford the ninth day of December, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne."
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
